chapter.title: Installation Scenarios
chapter.para: Different scenarios to install &slsreg; for SAP Applications 11 are available. Select the wanted installation scenario from the DVD boot menu:

listitem.para: Booting the installed system on the local hard disk.
Basically a standard SLES installation prepared for installing SAP applications later, either with the provided Installation Wizard or with third party installation routines.
Suitable for experienced administrators, who want to install &sles4sap; according to their own plan.

varlistentry.term: SLES for SAP Applications — Installation with Wizard (see )

listitem.para: This is a semi-automated installation of the operating system with default settings. At the end, the Installation Wizard for the installation of SAP applications will be started on demand. The user has the possibility to set the most important parameters for a basic installation of the system and the installation of the specified SAP application.

varlistentry.term: SLES for SAP Applications — Installation with External Profile (see )

listitem.para: This installation is driven by a user provided &ay; profile.
Suitable for experienced users, who are familiar with with &ay; and want to deploy their own &ay; profiles to install &sles4sap;.
Starting a minimal Linux system without a graphical user interface. For more information, see Chapter 34, Common Problems and Their Solutions of the &admin;.
Testing the system RAM using repeated read and write cycles. For more information, see Chapter 34, Common Problems and Their Solutions of the &admin;.

sect1.para: The first part is similar to a standard &sls; installation; for details, see the SLES &deploy;, Chapter 6, Installation with &yast;.
